CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( SSN__c ) ,'', IF( NOT( ISBLANK( SSN_Document_ID__c ) ) , HYPERLINK("/" &SSN_Document_ID__c,'View file','_self')& ' ' ,'Upload file' & ' ') & HYPERLINK('/lightning/cmp/c__filePreviewCmp?c__recordId='& Id & '&c__fileType=SSN' ,IMAGE('/resource/UploadIcon','Upload',20,20) ,'_self'))
CustomField.label: SSN Document
